pages.text: The brew kettle is primarily used to make $(o)Wort$() from water and grain that can then be used to make $(l:cellar/ales_and_lagers)Ales and Lagers$().$(br2)It also makes $(o)Must$() for making $(l:apiary/honey_mead)Mead$(), and $(l:milk/making_rennet)$(o)Rennet$() for making $(l:milk/making_cheese)Cheese$().
